games.title: Snake Game
games.description: Classic Snake game where you control a snake to eat food and grow longer. Avoid hitting the walls or yourself!
games.about: A classic Snake game with simple controls using arrow keys, wasd, or touch swipes. Perfect for quick, nostalgic gaming sessions and casual fun.
games.style: Minimalistic design with a clean interface. Simple contrast colored b&w and sharp edged graphics. Old fashion retro style.
games.controls: Use arrow/wasd keys or swipe on mobile to control the snake.

games.title: TETRIS Game
games.description: The classic block-stacking puzzle game. Rotate and move falling blocks to create complete lines.
games.about: A modern take on the iconic Tetris game with smooth controls, next piece preview, and an engaging scoring system. Challenge yourself to achieve higher scores!
games.style: Vibrant retro-inspired design with animated, colorful borders that cycle through classic Tetris piece colors. Modern UI elements with a nostalgic feel.
games.controls: Use arrow/wasd keys, control buttons, or swipe on mobile to control(move, rotate, drop) the pieces.

games.title: Minesweeper Game
games.description: Test your logic and luck in this classic minesweeper game. Clear the board without hitting any mines.
games.about: A faithful recreation of the classic Minesweeper game with multiple difficulty levels, timer, and mine counter. Perfect for strategy and logic puzzle enthusiasts.
games.style: Authentic Windows 95/98 aesthetic with the classic teal background and gray UI elements featuring 3D beveled effects. Includes the iconic blue title bar, digital-style counter displays, and traditional cell styling with classic number colors - a perfect recreation of the nostalgic Windows experience. Windows 9x style.
games.controls: Left-click to reveal cells, right-click to flag mines.

games.title: Sudoku Game
games.description: Challenge your mind with this classic japanese number puzzle game. Fill the grid following Sudoku rules.
games.about: Number-placement logic puzzle. Fill a 9Ã—9 grid with digits so each column, row, and section contains all digits from 1 to 9.
games.style: Modern Neomorphic design featuring soft shadows and subtle gradients on a light background. Uses purple accent colors, elegant rounded corners, and sophisticated shadow effects to create a clean, tactile interface. Includes visual feedback for valid/invalid entries and smooth transitions for a premium puzzle experience. Neomorphic/Neumorphism style.
games.controls: Click cells and use number pad or keyboard to fill in values.
